item.description:
I'm moving to North Carolina in a few weeks, but I'm holding one more long game day before I head south. It's taking place Saturday, June 11, starting at 11 am and running to 11 pm. I might have to cap attendance despite having four tables available for gaming, so please RSVP if you plan to attend.

As an additional incentive to attend, I'm selling hundreds of games via auction on BGG: Talisman, Maarvel Heroes, Stronghold, Vinci, Tahuantinsuyu and many more. Lots of unplayed and brely played games that I don't plan to pack on the moving truck. The auction ends June 6, and you can conveniently pick them up on June 11. How thoughtful of me! Here's the link: http://bit.ly/iEWS4S

Hope to see you here to say goodbye!

Eric
item.name: Game day in Concord, NH â€“ 11 to 11 on the 11th
